mcom.umeer.insert: INSERT INTO EM_ENTITY_CFG ( ID, CONTENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{content}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mcom.umeer.select: SELECT ID AS "id", CONTENT AS "content", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_ENTITY_CFG WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID AS "id", CONTENT AS "content", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_ENTITY_CFG WHERE ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "id", CONTENT AS "content", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_ENTITY_CFG WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id}, '%') AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
